Package edu.wpi.furious_furrets.database

Interface LocationDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocationsDAOImpl
    public interface LocationDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Taking user input for the ID of the new location node.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllLocations

        java.util.ArrayList<Location> getAllLocations()
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets all Locations in the location db and outputs them in an ArrayList
        Returns:
        ArrayList of type Location
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • updateLocation

        void updateLocation()
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Taking user input for the ID of the location node and the new values of the floor and location type. The Location is then updated in the Locations DB
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addLocation

        void addLocation()
          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Taking user input for the ID of the new location node. A new Java Location object is created and the node is added to the SQL table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteLocation

        void deleteLocation()
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Taking user input for the ID of the location node. The node is removed from the SQL table, and the corresponding Java object is deleted.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • saveLocation

        void saveLocation()
        Taking User input for the name of a CSV file. The program first loads all of the contents of the SQL Location table into Java Location objects. Then the CSV file is created from the Java objects.
